title: Galaxies crumble before Cosmic Reaver Kassadin

replies.body: And unlike every other server, we have to pay for our server skin.
we already got a free skin though.

And so did Russia who actually got 2 free skins at launch and then also got their server skin for free some months later. Or Turkey who got 2 free skins at launch, one being their server skin, and then a second server skin a year later.

No that was a skin to entice us to deal with a crashing unstable beta oce server,  the server would have failed to launch without the "transfer now for a free skin" addition because everyone would have waited for  everyone else to tell the server was stable and playable and didn't crash with short queue times,  if  not for that skin no one would have bothered moving to oce to test the server and server launch would have failed with 20+minute queue times for a game on top of the crashing and the  few ppl who did move to oce  without the skin incentive  would have quickly paid to move back to NA.
A handful of people got a free skin. There is no 'we' in this at all.
I will happily return my non-existent ppziggs for that kass skin (but I don't own kass T.T)
And by 'we' you mean a handful of players from NA who have pings above 300 because they aren't ACTUALLY from Oceania?

Nah I got it. Made an account on NA and gave up on LoL until OCE server.

Lucky me.

Its great because i actually already owned pool party ziggs from the pool party pack, so i got fuck all, and the other countries seemed to have skins limited to their countries, ours is sold worldwide and has nothing that even remotely says OCE in it. (unless you count the tiny southern cross in that picture)

Also it seems that other regions also get a discount on OUR skin
975 RP until 11:59 PDT on October 19 (1350 RP after that).

Alright, I don't comment much but I feel the need to let my frustrations be known. Either we shouldn't have to pay for the server skin or everyone in every other server should have to pay for theirs. There is enough discrimination against OCE in terms of over-costed games etc. I expected better of you Rito.

I donate to charity already and would rather it come off my tax than yours. Would make an exception to that if it wasn't our SERVER SKIN. In fact people would probably be praising you for the charity if it wasn't the server skin.
Logged in just to upvote this.

riot be saying "we hate this multicultural region, lets make them pay for skin, then give it to others for discounted price, there is actually nothing about this being a "free" sever skin, this is a plain skin that comes out every other day, putting stars on it doesn't make it special
They should also match the donated funds so if they raise 1k from the skin sales they should pay 1k out of their wallet.

I have more than 30 skins including almost all legendary skins but I will NOT buy this skin as a protest to the fact that we have to pay for our server skin. Rito for really? we have to pay for our skin?? Bulls***t!! {{summoner:11}} . If charity is your excuse let the whole world do charity with a separate charity skin or even a charity bundle. I will surely buy that whole bundle. But this is soo bs. Server skin should be free.

I agree, they should've given it to us in OCE for free and paid to charity maybe $2.50/per sale out of THEIR money and make the OTHER servers either not be able to get it at all or be able to get it but have to have the terms we have currently!
Welcome to OCE the one server riot hates.

All the consensus in the OCE community is that Riot has gone about this in entirely the wrong way. Both in making OCE pay for their server skin and in the way they explained their "reasons".

The only response we've been given is "Too bad, we MIGHT think of that in the future. After all, like 25% of you got a Ziggs skin."
Us getting it for half price is bugger all too, not only is it still going to be sold globally but it'll go on sale in other regions anyway. Leaving our server skin just a glorified normal skin release.

All in all, I think this is in quite poor taste regardless of the face-saving charity thing. Not only will you make money from selling the skin (as people cant buy just 675 RP), but the donations Riot Games make will be tax deductible, making this whole thing look even more sketchy.

Essentially, we're paying for our own server skin and paying for Riot Games to lower their taxes a bit.

I was going to buy it, but then I realized how ripped off we're all getting. Okay, it's going to charity, but they could have chosen any other skin. Instead they chose our server skin, the skin that each server is supposed to receive for free?

On top of this, think about it; look at the skin. What tells you "This is OCE"? There's only one thing in it, and that's the southern cross. Take that out, and what do you get? Maybe a scrapped Victorious Kassadin skin, that they slapped the southern cross on and decided to call it the OCE server skin.

I'm probably not going to buy the skin, it really just feels like I'm getting ripped off. If Riot instead made a separate skin for even Poppy going to charity, I would probably buy it despite not playing her ever. But not this. This is supposed to be our skin.

"Oh but we already gave you a skin for free, so we're not going to do another". Oh ok, can you please revoke skins that the other servers got for free? Don't try to lie, they got the better end of the bargain. You always push OCE aside.

But alas, there is nought that I can do. You have already forced this price upon us, and we have to pay no matter what. Charity? Cool. The skin that's supposed to represent our server being used to extract money from us? No thank you. Give us the server skin for free, and put another skin on sale and make that one go to charity, and I'd gladly pay for it, but now I feel like I'm just getting fucked over, and I can't say anything about it because of this righteous facade.
Finally a server skin! Surprised it was for {{champion:38}} but it looks great!
While I agree this is an awesome skin, it does not represent OCE even the tiniest bit. Also we should never have had to pay for it. No other region has had to pay for their server skin.

I don't really comment but it really bothers me that some people have this sense of entitlement, like riot has an obligation to give them a free skin just because other servers did receive free skins. League of legends is a free to play, fun game. What more could you ask for? And the skins that the other servers got for free is not comparable to how awesome this Kassadin skin is. Besides, the money you pay for this skin goes to charity. Is getting a free skin that important to people? smh

It's not about getting a free skin, it's about the fact that the skin representing our region is something that we have to pay for. Why am I not allowed to say "I'm part of OCE" unless I pay money for it?

Plus, using charity as an excuse feels like a really cheap and crappy way to get people to buy it. Like honestly, it's just a glorified excuse, nothing more. If I got this Kassadin skin for free, I would gladly buy a separate full price skin for the sake of charity, but this is supposed to be our skin, the skin that represents OCE, but the fact that we have to pay for it tells me that no, it does not represent OCE, it represents wealth and nothing more.

I guess by "awesome" you mean "sparkly"  well duh,  its a stars theme, I actually think Russian bear Cavalry skin is a better looking skin,  on top of  actually having regional theme's,  which this Kassadin skin does not since Southern Cross is just as referenced in South America

Yeah really great skin ......... (sarcasm) It represents Brazil and South America and Africa as much as it  represents Oceania, the southern cross is in the Brazil national anthem so really oceanic, specific.

Pool party ziggs was a free skin to entice people to move to the oceanic unstable often unplayable beta server with the promise we would get a free skin futher down the track.

YAY ITS FOR CHARITY! (so riot can claim most of what they pay to charity back in tax offsets getting the money anyway)

BUT MEDICAL REASEARCH MAN!  WE NEED TO STOP CANCER! ............. Stop eating sugar and processed carbs and excessive  amounts of meat if  you really  care about these causes.  Donating money to charities just gets lost in administration costs,  and if  it  does actually get to the research scientists, whatever they discover is patented by the multinational psychopath corporations and sold to us at ridiculous prices,  it may say $24 in the Chemists, but your actually paying $160 for it through the government paying most of the costs with our taxes. So no, donate to charity, good on ya,  really making a difference and help curing the symptoms not the actual problems/cause.

So yes, Fantastic Amazing skin so pretty I will ignore rational thought and buy it.

"Your just crying coz you cant afford to spend money on it"....... No, believe me I can afford it,  I have spent money on it in the past,  but I wont be spending money on this after riot said it would be free.

a) think of a better idea that encompasses oce then wise guy
b) dunno about everyone else but i moved to oce just to experience low ping, the skin was a bonus
c) who gives a shit, money is still going to charities
d) cancer isnt the only disease they could put money towards and remember that some of could be going towards medical services which could mean better facilities and more supplies which is very very welcome particularly in less developed areas
e) youre assuming the money is only going towards symptomatic treatment, whos to say its not going towards research for a cure, or going towards medical supplies in third world countries (medical charity)
f) even if you had the option to pay for a treatment that would alleviate the symptoms of for example a chronically debilitating disease, i dunno about you, but i wouldnt even blink before coughing up the dosh if it meant being able to live normally again. and while i dont like the fact that some companies prey off this attitude, who gives a shit when the seriously ill can regain functioning they never thought theyd have again.
g) even if no cure is found, its still another step closer to the real deal cause then the world has found one less way to cure whatever they were researching.
so to you and everyone else out there, STOP BEING A WHINY BITCH. look at what could be achieved here and stop being selfish %%%%s. if youre that against paying when its going to a charity anyway, just pipe down and fuck off your attitudes ARE cancer.

a) Oceania>Ocean>Ocean themed skin (maybe Nami or something)
b I moved to OCE to experience low ping, but many other people would have swapped to their region for the same reason, and they were lucky enough to not get fucked by Riot
c) Congratulations, it's going to charity. Who cares? It's a glorified excuse. It's like making people pay to breath, and then saying "Oh but it's okay, it's going to charity". this is supposed to represent OCE, not wealth. I would gladly pay 975 to go to charity, but this? This is supposed to be our server skin, and we're getting the bad end of the deal, especially compared to other regions.
d) N/A (No argument)
e) N/A
f) N/A
G) My attitude is not cancer, Riot's treatment, and just the world's treatment of OCE in general is cancer. We get ripped off all the time, the highest prices for almost everything, and we're always on the pointy end of the stick

A. In 5 minute search found me a better Skin idea, Little Penguins fizz or  Nami or whoever, they are found Native to Australia and New Zealand the two largest player bases of this servers region and only found elsewhere through vagrancy,  their are species of Bats only Native to Oceania that could also have been used, a Bat Anivia skin, The fact is the region is Diversity, So maybe an Elise Skin as a Crocodile With 1 of  her spiderlings turned into a Kiwi Bird 1 turned into a native lizard of the islands and 1 turned into another animal of the region,  this is me thinking for 5  minutes after reading your response ideas off the top of  my head,  not spending 2 years on the topic and only being able to come up with a STAR SIGN VISIBLE TO AND REFERENCED BY THE ENTIRE SOUTHERN HEMISPHERE of which "Oceania/Australasia" (Australia is not pat of oceania) is a VERY small part of particularly population wise, out whole part of  the southern hemisphere ROUGH estimate 100 million,  South America and Southern Africa, Billion or more.
Stop being so downy. What makes other servers deserve their server skin for free and not us?

This is such an awesome skin! At first I only brought it because it is the OCE skin and it is star inspired (I really like space and such like). But after playing Kass I realized that it is actually a really well created skin. It looks amazing, feels slick and smooth to play and I was able to make some pretty awesome plays. Thanks Riot.
So hyped for this! :D

you should actually make it available for ip purchase starting newyears day because it is our supposed "free skin" so making us wait to pay for it with "free" point would be a fine alternative, and those who got it with rp are those who wanted it early (still haven't seen a single person use this skin)

It's so amusing for me... I transferred from NA to OCE While the server transfer was "Free" ("well before the PP Ziggs skin giveway"...) And I didn't receive a PP skin for Ziggs, So I don't necessarily understand why I didn't get a Geometric Themed Skin for free... Like most other countries... And again, Riot wants me to Pay for a Geometric Themed Skin... Why you put so much hate on us Australian...
Not all of us are Alcoholic, Smoking dole bludgers
:/
{{champion:119}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3153}}

Right now, i feel like everyone complaining that this skin isn't free needs to shut up. Not only did the makers of this skin do a fantastic job making this and that the proceeds are going to charity, we are actually going to get a server skin, which for a long time we were told that we might not. Another fact is that riot doesn't have a cache of all the people who moved across during the beta and they can't just give non beta accounts a free skin for not having to endure the beta, i mean, that would be unfair. IMO you should be happy that we actually have a server skin that looks amazing.{{summoner:4}}'s away.

Actually Riot has complete records of everyone who transferred and exactly when. They have posted such on these forums.

The skin proceeds going to charity is simply a marketing ploy to reduce taxes, increase RP income, (you cant just buy the amount of RP to get the skin, you have to buy extra) and garner public goodwill despite the fact that we were all led to believe this skin was free.

Yeah, complaining about it is probably pointless. Riot has already shown that they don't care. As for "i feel like everyone complaining that this skin isn't free needs to shut up". Thats, just like, your opinion man.

Personally I would've been far happier if Riot just said "Sorry guys, no server skin" rather than "Here's the server skin, wallets out boys."

why is everyone sooooooo Whingy? its 675 RP, pay the $5 (in fact, i don't even think it's that much!) and get a hectic skin. or don't and shut yer whiny mouths. and the stars and constellations are a VERY central part of many Oceanic countries origins and traditions. if it weren't for the stars the original Maori settlers of New Zealand would never have been there. not to mention both the blade and recall of the skin are **OBVIOUS** references to the Southern Cross. the Southern Cross literally beams around Kassadin when you recall

What's even funnier  Australia is not even included as part of Oceania most of the time, Australasia being a continent in its own right and Oceania being the adjacent regions or  Polynesia Micronesia and Melanesia.   http://geography.answers.com/navigation/facts-about-oceania
i never got no free skins :({{item:3073}}
Riot = Worst Financial Priorities and being overall %%%%s.

So we get a "server skin" that represents nothing of our region other than that tiny recall with the southern cross right at the end - never mind the actual skin showing off nothing. We have to pay for it while other countries got theirs free. And on top of that this server skin SPECIFIC TO OCE is available in every other region and also gets the same discount we get.. the fuck. If you wanted to represent OCE then... I dunno choose a champ like {{champion:223}} and give him a kangaroo outfit so that when he w's you he puts you in his pouch or throws a rugby ball at you when he is using his q. Hell! Even that Crocodile Dundee rip off skin for {{champion:58}} looks more like an OCE rep than {{champion:38}}
The distinct lack of sparkly stars in game disappoints me {{item:3151}}
Anyone else have the option to refund this skin? I have no refunds left ahahahha
{{champion:38}} {{item:3070}}
